channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A South Carolina man is set to become the first executed by firing squad in 15 years
item.description: A South Carolina man convicted of murder is scheduled to be executed by firing squad Friday night. Brad Sigmon beat to death his ex-girlfriend’s paren...

item.title: WATCH: Hockey great Alex Ovechkin making a difference
item.description: Alex Ovechkin, one of the greatest hockey players of all time, is approaching Wayne Gretzky's all-time record of 894 goals scored while playing for a ...

item.title: 3 men randomly shoot at customers in Toronto pub, wounding 12
item.description: Police said three armed individuals entered the pub and "opened fire indiscriminately on the people sitting inside."

item.title: In-N-Out’s billionaire heiress says she stood in line for 2 hours to land a job at her own store when she was just a teenager to shake the ‘stigma of being the owner’s kid’ and ‘earn respect’
Curiosity Cracked Open a Rock on Mars And Discovered a Big Surprise
WATCH: How social media helped fuel a female mechanic's business
item.description: ABC News' Will Ganss is here with the story about Desiree Hill who found a massive online community when switching from nursing to auto work.

item.title: Eating This Fruit Daily Can Improve Insulin Resistance in Just 4 Weeks
Firing squad witness describes execution: "My heart started pounding"
item.description: Jeffrey Collins was one of three media witnesses for the firing squad execution of Brad Sigmon. He has been a witness to 11 South Carolina executions.

item.title: Federal judge to hear arguments over whether to block immigration arrests in US schools
Investigation advances into Gene Hackman’s mysterious death, with update by New Mexico authorities
Chiefs wide receiver Xavier Worthy arrested on domestic assault charge
item.description: Xavier Worthy faces a third-degree felony assault charge, according to jail records.

item.title: After 40 years on the run, escaped prisoner from Puerto Rico caught in Florida
item.description: A man who escaped a Puerto Rican prison nearly 40 years ago was taken into custody in Florida, according to the Lee County Sheriff's Office.

item.title: House unveils stopgap measure to keep government funded, avert shutdown
item.description: The continuing resolution bill will go to the House Rules Committee on Monday and a floor vote is expected Tuesday.

item.title: DOJ investigating major egg producers amid soaring prices: Sources
item.description: The Justice Department is in the early stages of investigating the major egg producers over soaring egg prices, source familiar with the matter told A...

item.title: Charles Barkley says Michael Jordan gave him 1 financial tip that made him millions, and you can use it to get rich, too
Russia's arms exports are going bust as foreign buyers bolt and the Ukraine war chews through its weapons
2 dogs rescued after being kidnapped, ransomed for over $1 million
item.description: The dogs' kidnappers tried to ransom the animals for over $1,135,000, Swiss police said Saturday.

item.title: 12 injured in shooting at Toronto pub
item.description: At least 12 people have been injured in a shooting at a pub in Toronto on Friday night, police said.
